result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy Robert Krukowski

defendant.name: Krukowski, Timothy Robert
defendant.address: 25108 West Loomis Road, Wind Lake, WI 53185

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Timothy Robert Krukowski appeared by video.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia appeared by video for Timothy Robert Krukowski.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court took judicial notice of the defendants 3 prior OWI convictions. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Milwaukee County Sheriff Deputy M. Sexton. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report 10-04-2022

Defendant Timothy Robert Krukowski in court in person.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. State's Witness is present. Defense Counsel in trial and unable to appear. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report 09-06-2022

Court orders defendant TO JUSTICE POINT LEVEL 3 for supervision. Defendant to report to JUSTICE POINT immediately upon leaving court.
IF THE DEFENDANT FAILS TO REPORT A WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST. 
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription taken in a manner and fashion as prescribed. 
No driving without a valid license.

Defendant Timothy Robert Krukowski in court. Attorney Fred Richardson appeared as a friend of the court.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 8/24/22 @ 1p
